name: Character Oracles
description: Donâ€™t try to build a fully formed understanding character when you first encounter them; instead, focus on what your character learns or perceives as a first impression using oracles such as @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.e422399eb54ed7b1]{First Look} and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.9ad07730b122052d]{Initial Disposition}.
